data.eml:eml: Amphipoda (Crustacea) from Palau, Micronesia: Families Maeridae and Melitidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Myers, A. A. (2016): Amphipoda (Crustacea) from Palau, Micronesia: Families Maeridae and Melitidae. Zootaxa 4170 (3): 451-474, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4170.3.2
